com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.adapter
Class GeometryAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.adapter.GeometryAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircleAdapter, PolyLineAdapter
public abstract class GeometryAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract adaptor to relate the geometries with the fframes and to be able to integrate them in the Layout.

Author:
Vicente Caballero Navarro
